mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ADDRESS( USER_ID, ADDRESS, ADDRESS_NAME, RECIPIENT_NAME, RECIPIENT_PHONE ) VALUES ( #{userId}, #{address}, #{addressName}, #{recipientName}, #{recipientPhone} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ADDRESS SET ADDRESS = #{address}, ADDRESS_NAME = #{addressName}, RECIPIENT_NAME = #{recipientName}, RECIPIENT_PHONE = #{recipientPhone} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId} AND ADDRESS_ID = #{addressId}
mapper.select: SELECT ADDRESS_ID, ADDRESS, ADDRESS_NAME, RECIPIENT_NAME, RECIPIENT_PHONE FROM ADDRESS WHERE USER_ID = #{userId};
